question_en: Which of the following is NOT one of the fundamental principles of British life listed in the handbook?
question_zh: 以下哪一項不是手冊列出的英國生活基本原則？
options_en: Democracy | The rule of law | One-party rule | Individual liberty
options_zh: 民主 | 法治 | 一黨專政 | 個人自由

question_en: What do new citizens pledge to uphold during the citizenship ceremony?
question_zh: 新公民在入籍儀式上承諾維護的是什麼？
options_en: Religious law | The values and laws of the UK | The values of their country of birth | The policies of the current government
options_zh: 宗教法律 | 英國的價值與法律 | 出生國的價值 | 當前政府政策

question_en: Which of these is a responsibility expected of all UK residents?
question_zh: 以下哪項是所有英國居民應承擔的責任？
options_en: Disobey laws you disagree with | Respect the rights of others | Join a political party | Serve in the armed forces
options_zh: 不認同的法律可不遵守 | 尊重他人權利 | 必須加入政黨 | 必須服兵役

question_en: Which freedom is offered in the UK?
question_zh: 英國保障哪項自由？
options_en: Freedom from taxation | Freedom of belief and religion | Freedom to ignore jury summons | Freedom to carry firearms without licence
options_zh: 免稅自由 | 信仰與宗教自由 | 可忽視陪審團傳票 | 無需許可攜帶槍械的自由

question_en: The Life in the UK test normally contains how many questions?
question_zh: 《英國生活》考試通常有多少題？

question_en: Which languages can the Life in the UK test be taken in by special arrangement, besides English?
question_zh: 除英語外，《英國生活》考試可在特別安排下使用哪些語言？
options_en: Welsh or Scottish Gaelic | Irish or Cornish | French or German | Punjabi or Urdu
options_zh: 威爾士語或蘇格蘭蓋爾語 | 愛爾蘭語或康沃爾語 | 法語或德語 | 旁遮普語或烏爾都語

question_en: Which website is used to book the Life in the UK test?
question_zh: 預訂《英國生活》考試應使用哪個網站？
options_en: lifeintheuktest.gov.uk | ukba.homeoffice.gov.uk | parliament.uk | nhs.uk
options_zh: lifeintheuktest.gov.uk | ukba.homeoffice.gov.uk | parliament.uk | nhs.uk

question_en: Which of the following correctly describes the UK?
question_zh: 以下哪一項正確描述了英國？
options_en: England, Scotland, Wales and the Republic of Ireland | England, Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland | Great Britain and the Channel Islands only | Britain and the British Isles are the same as the UK
options_zh: 英格蘭、蘇格蘭、威爾士和愛爾蘭共和國 | 英格蘭、蘇格蘭、威爾士和北愛爾蘭 | 只包括大不列顛與海峽群島 | 不列顛與不列顛群島等於英國

question_en: What are the Channel Islands and the Isle of Man collectively called?
question_zh: 海峽群島和曼島合稱為什麼？
options_en: Overseas territories | Crown dependencies | UK counties | British Isles
options_zh: 海外領地 | 王室屬地（皇冠附屬地） | 英國郡 | 不列顛群島

question_en: Which parts of the UK have devolved parliaments or assemblies?
question_zh: 英國哪些部分擁有權力下放的議會或議會機構？
options_en: England only | Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland | Scotland only | Wales and England
options_zh: 僅英格蘭 | 蘇格蘭、威爾士和北愛爾蘭 | 僅蘇格蘭 | 威爾士與英格蘭

question_en: Which document first limited the English king’s power and asserted the rule of law?
question_zh: 哪份文件首次限制英格蘭國王的權力並確立法治？
options_en: Bill of Rights (1689) | Magna Carta (1215) | Act of Union (1707) | Petition of Right (1628)

question_en: The Battle of Bannockburn (1314) secured independence for which nation from English conquest?
question_zh: 班諾克本戰役（1314）使哪個民族免於英格蘭征服而保持獨立？
options_en: Wales | Ireland | Scotland | Cornwall
options_zh: 威爾士 | 愛爾蘭 | 蘇格蘭 | 康沃爾

question_en: Which war between England and France lasted 116 years?
question_zh: 英法之間哪場戰爭持續了116年？
options_en: The Hundred Years War | The Thirty Years War | The Seven Years War | The War of the Roses
options_zh: 百年戰爭 | 三十年戰爭 | 七年戰爭 | 玫瑰戰爭

question_en: What catastrophic disease killed about one third of England’s population in the 14th century?
question_zh: 14世紀導致英格蘭約三分之一人口死亡的災難性疾病是？
options_en: Smallpox | Black Death (plague) | Cholera | Typhus
options_zh: 天花 | 黑死病（瘟疫） | 霍亂 | 斑疹傷寒

question_en: Which event united the Houses of Lancaster and York?
question_zh: 哪一事件促成蘭開斯特與約克兩家合一？
options_en: Act of Union 1707 | Marriage of Henry VII and Elizabeth of York | Magna Carta | Glorious Revolution
options_zh: 1707年《聯合法案》 | 亨利七世與約克的伊麗莎白之婚 | 《大憲章》 | 光榮革命

question_en: Which 1689 law confirmed Parliament’s rights and limited the monarch’s powers?
question_zh: 哪一部1689年的法律確認了議會的權利並限制君主權力？
options_en: Bill of Rights | Habeas Corpus Act | Reform Act | Parliament Act
options_zh: 《權利法案》 | 《人身保護法》 | 《改革法案》 | 《議會法》

question_en: Who is associated with steam power improvements that helped drive the Industrial Revolution?
question_zh: 誰與改良蒸汽動力有關，推動了工業革命？
options_en: James Watt | Isaac Newton | Michael Faraday | Robert Boyle
options_zh: 詹姆斯·瓦特 | 艾薩克·牛頓 | 邁克爾·法拉第 | 羅伯特·波以耳

question_en: Where can Admiral Nelson’s flagship HMS Victory be visited?
question_zh: 尼爾遜上將的旗艦“勝利號”可在哪裡參觀？
options_en: Plymouth | Portsmouth | Bristol | Liverpool
options_zh: 普利茅斯 | 樸茨茅斯 | 布里斯托 | 利物浦

question_en: What did the 1807 Act concerning slavery do in the British Empire?
question_zh: 1807年與奴隸制度相關的法案在大英帝國中產生了什麼影響？
options_en: Abolished slavery in all territories | Abolished the slave trade in British ships and ports | Gave slaves the vote | Created new colonies
options_zh: 廢除所有領土的奴隸制 | 禁止英國船隻與港口的奴隸貿易 | 給予奴隸投票權 | 建立新殖民地

question_en: Which Prime Minister led Britain during most of WWII and was known for inspirational speeches?
question_zh: 哪位首相在二戰大部分時間領導英國，並以鼓舞人心的演說聞名？
options_en: Neville Chamberlain | Winston Churchill | Clement Attlee | Harold Macmillan
options_zh: 張伯倫 | 溫斯頓·丘吉爾 | 克萊門特·艾德禮 | 哈羅德·麥克米倫

question_en: Which creation in 1948 guaranteed healthcare free at the point of use?
question_zh: 1948年成立、保證就醫時免費的是什麼機構？
options_en: BBC | NHS | NATO | WTO
options_zh: 英國廣播公司 | 國民保健服務（NHS） | 北約 | 世界貿易組織

question_en: What is ‘D‑Day’ commonly used to describe?
question_zh: “諾曼第登陸日（D-Day）”通常用來描述什麼事件？
options_en: Germany’s invasion of Poland | Allied landings in Normandy in 1944 | The Blitz on London | The end of WWI
options_zh: 德軍入侵波蘭 | 1944年盟軍在諾曼第登陸 | 德軍對倫敦的閃電戰 | 一戰結束

question_en: What does ‘Great Britain’ refer to?
question_zh: “大不列顛”指的是什麼？
options_en: England, Wales, Scotland | The whole UK | The British Isles | England and Wales only
options_zh: 英格蘭、威爾士與蘇格蘭 | 整個英國 | 不列顛群島 | 僅英格蘭與威爾士

question_en: Which right is part of living in the UK?
question_zh: 在英國生活擁有哪些權利之一？
options_en: Right to a fair trial | Right to ignore taxes | Right to vote at 14 | Right to compulsory jury service for visitors
options_zh: 公平審判的權利 | 忽視納稅的權利 | 14歲投票權 | 旅客必須擔任陪審員的權利

question_en: Who wrote The Canterbury Tales?
question_zh: 誰寫了《坎特伯里故事集》？
options_en: William Shakespeare | Geoffrey Chaucer | John Milton | Daniel Defoe
options_zh: 威廉·莎士比亞 | 喬叟 | 約翰·彌爾頓 | 丹尼爾·笛福

question_en: What was a major result of the Black Death on society?
question_zh: 黑死病對社會的一項主要影響是什麼？
options_en: Stronger monarchy | Labour shortages and rising wages | End of Parliament | Expansion of the Roman Empire
options_zh: 君權更強 | 勞動力短缺與工資上升 | 議會終結 | 羅馬帝國擴張

question_en: What is the Union Flag commonly called?
question_zh: 英國國旗通常被稱為什麼？
options_en: St George’s Cross | Union Jack | Saltire | Tricolour

question_en: Which act in 1707 created the Kingdom of Great Britain?

options_en: Bill of Rights | Act of Union | Reform Act | Parliament Act
options_zh: 《權利法案》 | 《聯合法案》 | 《改革法案》 | 《議會法》

question_zh: 貝塞麥轉爐法促進了哪個產業的發展？
options_en: Textile looms | Mass production of steel and shipbuilding/railways | Printing | Agriculture
options_zh: 紡織機 | 鋼鐵大量生產與造船/鐵路 | 印刷 | 農業

question_en: Who pioneered modern nursing after work in the Crimean War?
question_zh: 在克里米亞戰爭後開創現代護理的是誰？
options_en: Mary Peters | Florence Nightingale | Emmeline Pankhurst | Mary Seacole
options_zh: 瑪麗·彼得斯 | 弗羅倫斯·南丁格爾 | 愛米琳·潘克赫斯特 | 瑪麗·西科爾

question_en: Which Prime Minister’s government created the NHS in 1948?

options_en: Clement Attlee | Winston Churchill | Harold Macmillan | Margaret Thatcher
options_zh: 克萊門特·艾德禮 | 溫斯頓·丘吉爾 | 哈羅德·麥克米倫 | 瑪格麗特·戴卓爾

options_en: German night-time bombing of UK cities in WWII | Allied landings in Italy | British naval blockade | A WWI trench tactic
options_zh: 二戰期間德軍對英國城市的夜間轟炸 | 盟軍登陸義大利 | 英國的海軍封鎖 | 一戰的壕溝戰術

question_zh: 艾倫·圖靈概念上與哪項發明相關？
options_en: Jet engine | Turing machine, foundation of modern computing | Hovercraft | MRI scanner

question_zh: 《耶穌受難日協議》主要與哪一地區有關？

options_zh: 蘇格蘭權力下放 | 緩解北愛爾蘭的大規模暴力 | 加入歐盟 | 建立NHS

question_en: Which statement is true about the UK Parliament?
question_zh: 以下哪項關於英國議會的敘述正確？

options_en: Sir Frank Whittle | Sir Robert Watson‑Watt | Sir Peter Mansfield | James Goodfellow
options_zh: 法蘭克·惠特爾 | 羅伯特·華生‑瓦特 | 彼得·曼斯菲爾德 | 詹姆斯·古德費洛

options_en: The Beatles and The Rolling Stones | Oasis and Blur | The Kinks and ABBA | Queen and U2

options_zh: 《解放法案》 | 《改革法案》 | 《教育法》 | 《議會法》

question_en: Who was the first to split the atom in work that later linked to the Manhattan Project?
question_zh: 誰率先“劈裂原子”，其研究後來與曼哈頓計畫相關？
options_en: Ernest Rutherford and colleagues | Alexander Fleming | John Logie Baird | Tim Berners‑Lee
options_zh: 拉塞福與同事 | 亞歷山大·弗萊明 | 約翰·洛吉·貝爾德 | 提姆·伯納斯‑李

question_zh: 哪句話描述了戰後英國重建的人力需求？
options_en: There was a surplus of labour | There were labour shortages | All work was automated | Only soldiers were hired
options_zh: 勞動力過剩 | 勞動力短缺 | 工作全自動化 | 只雇用軍人

question_en: Which speech about decolonisation is associated with Harold Macmillan?
question_zh: 哪篇關於去殖民化的演說與麥克米倫相關？
options_en: The Wind of Change speech | The Iron Curtain speech | The Rivers of Blood speech | The Tryst with Destiny speech
options_zh: 《變革之風》演說 | 《鐵幕》演說 | 《血之河》演說 | 《與命運的約會》演說

options_en: All visitors must serve | Eligible citizens may be called to serve | Only MPs can serve | It is illegal in the UK

question_zh: 誰發展出電視系統，促成1932年倫敦至格拉斯哥的首次電視傳送？

options_zh: 比爾·蓋茲 | 史蒂夫·喬布斯 | 提姆·伯納斯‑李 | 李納斯·托瓦茲

question_en: What was a social change for women in the 1960s mentioned in the handbook?
question_zh: 手冊中提及的1960年代女性社會變化之一是？
options_en: Loss of property rights | Equal pay laws and anti‑discrimination | Ban from universities | Loss of voting rights
options_zh: 喪失財產權 | 同工同酬與反歧視法律 | 禁止上大學 | 失去投票權

question_zh: 哪個事件與“敦刻爾克精神”這一說法相關？

options_zh: 1940年從法國撤離部隊 | 特拉法加海戰 | 滑鐵盧戰役 | 索姆河戰役

question_en: Which statement best describes ‘the rule of law’?
question_zh: 以下哪句最能描述“法治”？
options_en: The government is above the law | Everyone, including the government, is subject to the law | Only judges follow the law | Laws apply only to citizens

question_en: Which of these is a way to participate in community life?
question_zh: 下列哪項是參與社區生活的方式？

options_zh: 忽視地方事務 | 做義工、幫助鄰里 | 只需納稅 | 經常搬家

question_en: Which statement about British Overseas Territories is correct?
question_zh: 以下關於英國海外領地的陳述何者正確？
options_en: They are part of the UK | They are linked to the UK but not part of it | They are EU member states | They are Crown dependencies
options_zh: 它們是英國本土的一部分 | 與英國有聯繫但不屬於英國 | 它們是歐盟成員國 | 它們是王室屬地

options_en: Abolition of Parliament | Votes for the working classes and wider suffrage | Restoration of absolute monarchy | Union with France

question_zh: 英國與布爾人之間於1902年結束的是哪場戰爭？

question_zh: 依據《權利法案》，議會關於軍隊獲得了哪項新權力？

options_zh: 任命所有軍官 | 每年批准陸海軍經費 | 戰場指揮部隊 | 廢除海軍

options_en: Spitfire and Hurricane | Lancaster and Wellington | Harrier and Tornado | Concorde and Comet
